title.value: Metrics Reloaded – A new recommendation framework for biomedical image analysis validation
title.justification: The title is explicitly stated at the beginning of the paper.
title.quote: Metrics Reloaded – A new recommendation framework for biomedical image analysis validation

extractions.description: This paper presents a new framework for selecting appropriate performance metrics for biomedical image analysis validation, addressing the challenges and shortcomings of current practices.

type.justification: The paper focuses on practical applications and provides a framework based on empirical input from experts worldwide.
type.quote: Based on input from experts from more than 60 institutions worldwide, we believe our metric recommendation framework to be useful.

name.justification: The research is focused on metrics for validating biomedical image analysis algorithms.
name.quote: Meaningful performance assessment of biomedical image analysis algorithms depends on objective and appropriate performance metrics.

name.justification: Semantic segmentation is explicitly mentioned as one of the image analysis categories covered.
name.quote: During this step, the category mapping assigns the given problem to the appropriate image processing category, namely image-level classification, semantic segmentation, object detection and instance segmentation.

name.justification: Object detection is explicitly mentioned as one of the image analysis categories covered.
name.quote: During this step, the category mapping assigns the given problem to the appropriate image processing category, namely image-level classification, semantic segmentation, object detection and instance segmentation.

name.justification: Instance segmentation is explicitly mentioned as one of the image analysis categories covered.
name.quote: During this step, the category mapping assigns the given problem to the appropriate image processing category, namely image-level classification, semantic segmentation, object detection and instance segmentation.

name.justification: Image-level classification is explicitly mentioned as one of the image analysis categories covered.
